title: Can we create our own player for video games? (Cartoon, avatar) | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: Junaid says is it permissible to create your own player, like cartoon form avatar while playing video games? Well, this depends.   If you are creating a character and you are putting the face, the eyes &, etc, this is haram, this is drawing. but if it is a selection of different characters, & you choose one, this is permissible, inn
